title: Ball don’t lie, but will stats do? (NBA MVP Prediction)
blurb: A statistical journey through NBA history, predicting MVPs from 2005 to 2023 using logistic regression. Model ranks Jokić #1; WS per 48 and playmaking metrics dominate.

title: Artisphere – Virtual Museum for Benildean Artists
blurb: A love letter to campus creativity. Artisphere is a digital museum designed with Unreal Engine and Kuula to celebrate Benildean artists in an immersive, accessible 360-degree experience. Built with Unreal Engine; deployed via Kuula.

title: Pokémon Reinforcement Learning Agent (Gen 8 OU)
blurb: An AI agent built with Q-learning that simulates competitive Pokémon battles. The bot learns adaptive, matchup-based strategies using persistent memory and custom rewards. Q-table persists across sessions.

title: Power BI: Building a Competitive Pokémon Team (Gen 1 to 6)
blurb: A Power BI dashboard that visualizes base stats, megas, and type matchups across generations to construct a balanced and competitive Pokémon team. Interactive filters for type coverage and stat leaders.

title: Energrain – Whey Cereal Brand and GTM Strategy
blurb: A protein cereal brand built from scratch, including brand identity, nutrition focus, and a go-to-market strategy targeting fitness communities and micro-influencers.

title: Napoleon Brandy – Time Actually Tells
blurb: A controversial ad reimagined into a moving brand story about legacy, maturity, and craftsmanship. Anchored on a narrative of 15 years of earned excellence. Reframed into a time-led quality story; tagline: ‘Time Actually Tells.’

title: Caption Science – Optimizing Social Media Captions
blurb: An end-to-end BI model for social-media captions across Instagram, TikTok, and Facebook. It mines and standardizes caption attributes, provides reporting and dashboards, tests predictive baselines (AUC ≈ .50–.65), and offers ethically framed optimization guidance—making the limits of caption-only prediction visible while supporting better, data-informed choices

title: Netflix Case Study – Strategy and Staying Power
blurb: A deep dive into how Netflix defied competition by mastering vertical integration, algorithmic personalization, and global expansion. Frameworks meet foresight (Porter’s Five Forces, value chain, platform strategy).

title: Benildean Project Matrix – Role-Based KPI Dashboard
blurb: A Looker Studio dashboard system tailored to student organizations. Tracks project status, member activity, helpdesk queries, and forms submission across roles. 5 KPIs, auto-refresh Looker Studio.

title: AI Adoption – What Drives Consumer Behavior?
blurb: Survey-based study of AI use and trust in real life applications (n=102). Logistic regression shows intention and trust strongly influence whether people embrace AI.

title: PBA TORQUE – Talent Optimization for Basketball
blurb: A league-wide analytics proposal for the Philippine Basketball Association. Combines draft simulations, talent scores, and lineup optimizations to guide recruitment. Draft sim prototype (notional).
